jcr:content.jcr:title: Volunteer Tool Kit (VTK) Training hosted by Community 3

data.details:
One of our most Powerful online tools.  This wonderful planning resource is for our Girl Scout Daisy, Brownie, and Junior Troop Leaders.  This tool allows the leaders to plan out their entire year, manage the troop attendance, and communicate with the caregivers of all scheduled activities.

VTK is a comprehensive digital tool accessible via the web platform on home computers, smartphones, and tablets.

Feel free to bring your laptops or tablets to training so that we can help you get started!!!

All communities are welcome to attend any VTK training.
